titleStmt.title: Aurorata· By Thomas Prujean, student of Gonvile and Caius Colledge in Cambridge.
titleStmt.author: Prujean, Thomas, 1622 or 3-1662.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Hugh Perry neere Ivy Bridge in the Strand,

notesStmt.note: "Loves looking-glasse divine and humane" has separate dated title page; register is continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
